data.text: @yinneedsyang @finbar_mueller @Prof_Davros @DrRalphNap Except that you don't know the global death rate for the last 2 years.
@yinneedsyang @finbar_mueller @DrRalphNap Ignorance is blissâ€¦you seem really happy.

@finbar_mueller @yinneedsyang @Prof_Davros @DrRalphNap Kinda strange that my relatives, who got vaccinated, were not told a single item on those 8 pages, nor were they provided with any documentation. How many were told before getting vaccinated?

@yinneedsyang @Prof_Davros @DrRalphNap I had a look at the links you posted. You need to take off your tinfoil hat and start to see it for what it is. I don't know what forums or nutjobs pushed you down this path of paranoia, but I genuinely pity you. Sure I'm the manchild, keep LARPing.

@yinneedsyang @Prof_Davros @DrRalphNap Lol, you're acting like you "know how the sausage gets made" and have some special insight as opposed to the average joe. You're so far up your own ass it's astounding. What examples of propaganda-induced manipulation have you pulled off? Hmm?
@finbar_mueller @Prof_Davros @DrRalphNap Your reading comprehension is abysmal. Never claimed such egomaniacal feats.
@yinneedsyang @Prof_Davros @DrRalphNap Oh gee, you wise and insightful propaganda genius, pray tell: what manner of propaganda have you cranked out? Impress me.

@yinneedsyang @Prof_Davros @DrRalphNap We've all taken a media class buddy, we all know your cheap tricks, they don't impress anyone. They work on some. But you're sat there talking like you and your ilk are on par with Mao, Hitler or Stalin. You're not all-powerful manipulators, not even close.
@finbar_mueller @Prof_Davros @DrRalphNap Do you even know what propaganda is? I made it for years.
